elementList.description: Discover this cozy, renovated apartment for rent, ideal for those seeking comfort and an excellent location! Located in the former Eixample district, just steps from the Hospital Clínic, this home offers everything you need to enjoy city living. With 75 m² built and 58 m² usable space, it features two bedrooms which, although they have limited natural light, are perfect for relaxing. The kitchen and bathroom are brand new, equipped with a ceramic hob and oven, making your daily life easier. The interior living-dining room, without windows, provides a cozy space to unwind. Furthermore, natural gas radiator heating ensures a comfortable environment year-round. This apartment, located on the first floor with elevator access and a southeast orientation, is perfect for those looking for a practical and well-connected home, with all types of public transport nearby. Despite having all kinds of shops close by, the apartment is very quiet and peaceful. To schedule a visit or request additional information, please leave your contact details and one of our agents will contact you shortly. Don't miss this opportunity and come see it! In compliance with Article 31 of Housing Law 12/2023 of May 24, 2023, the following information is provided: • The property is located in an area with a high demand for residential properties. • The landlord is not a large-scale property owner. • The methodology of the State Housing Rental Price Index system establishes a reference rent of between €815.53 and €1,089. 98 per month. • The property has not been previously rented as a primary residence. • Lease term: 5 years. Mandatory stay for the first 6 months. • Community fees, property tax (IBI), and garbage collection fee (€115.04/month) are the responsibility of the tenant. • The total rent is the reference price plus applicable expenses: €1,089. 98 + €115.04 = €1,205. 02 • One month's rent as a security deposit and one month's rent as an additional security deposit. • Marketing and contract preparation fees are the responsibility of the owners.

elementList.description: For rent: beautiful apartment of approximately 25m2 in a single, open-plan loft-style space without a separate bedroom. It has been completely renovated with top-quality finishes. It is entirely exterior-facing and features an open-plan kitchen with a ceramic hob, oven, and extractor hood. New bathroom with a shower tray and screen. Climalit aluminum carpentry, exterior balcony facing the street, and very bright. Located in El Carmel, in a 1970s exposed brick building without an elevator (3rd floor). It is rented unfurnished and without appliances. Located in the Carmel neighborhood, one minute from the L5 El Carmel metro station, in a rapidly expanding neighborhood with an unbeatable location due to its proximity to ring roads and exits from Barcelona. Ideal apartment for singles or couples. Don't miss out on visiting it. elementList.description: Discover this charming 35 m2 loft-style apartment, recently renovated by a local architect to perfectly blend style, comfort, and functionality. Just steps from the sea, this open-concept space features a small balcony with Mediterranean views and enjoys beautiful morning sunlight thanks to its ideal orientation. On the rooftop, you’ll find a shared terrace—perfect for soaking up the sun, reading a book, or taking in panoramic views of the coastline. Fully furnished and move-in ready, the apartment comes equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay: towels, Wi-Fi, TV, and more. The kitchen also includes a modern reverse osmosis system, so you can enjoy clean, drinkable tap water without the need for bottled water. Unbeatable location—only 50 meters from the beach and exceptionally well-connected by public transport, with nearby bus lines (V15, 39) and the Barceloneta metro station (L4) just around the corner. Ideal for anyone seeking the Mediterranean lifestyle with all the conveniences of city living.

suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Barceloneta, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in calle de la Mestrança

elementList.description: Charming furnished studio just steps from the beach, perfect for those seeking comfort and a relaxed lifestyle by the sea. Located on a third real floor without a lift, it offers a bright, modern and well-designed space. The double bedroom, partially open to the living area, features a comfortable bed and a spacious wardrobe. The living room is filled with natural light, includes a sofa bed, a TV and direct access to a lovely balcony ideal for enjoying the outdoors. The open-plan kitchen comes fully equipped with a fridge, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine, making everyday living easy. The bathroom is modern and fitted with a practical shower. The flat is delivered fully furnished, with installed internet —perfect for remote work—, air conditioning, and towels and bed linen included. Utilities are not included in the rental price. The building is well maintained and sits in a privileged location close to the sea, offering a calm and pleasant atmosphere all year round. A cosy, bright home with everything you need to enjoy Mediterranean living from day one. This property does not belong to a large landlord and it is within the official rental price reference index.

suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Barceloneta, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in calle de la Sal

elementList.description: This charming mid-term rental apartment is located in one of the most pleasant and peaceful areas of Putxet, a residential neighbourhood known for its calm atmosphere and excellent connections. It is an ideal option for those coming to Barcelona temporarily for work, studies, research or professional projects. The living and dining area is bright and spacious, featuring two classic balconies that fill the space with natural light. The traditional Catalan vaulted ceiling combined with exposed wooden beams gives the home a unique character, blending classic charm with a modern feel. The open-plan kitchen integrates perfectly with the living area, creating a warm and sociable environment. The flat offers two bedrooms: a comfortable double room and a single room, which works perfectly as a guest room, home office or study space during temporary stays. The main bathroom includes a shower, and there is also a guest toilet for extra convenience. Wooden flooring and gas heating add warmth and comfort throughout the year. Set in the peaceful Putxet area, the flat enjoys proximity to local shops, parks and excellent transport links, making it an ideal choice for anyone seeking a quiet, high-quality stay in Barcelona. The property is not a large landlord and complies with the rental reference index. Seasonal rental. Justification for temporary stay required.

It also has a very comfortable desk. The bathroom is modern and functional. The apartment includes Wi-Fi, air conditioning or heating, washing machine, dryer, air fryer and iron. elementList.description: Reference: T12640-0 MONTHLY RENTAL FROM 32 DAYS UP TO 11 MONTHS. AVAILABLE FROM February 11, 2026. MONTHLY RENTAL ShBarcelona presents this charming flat for rent, located in a privileged environment right in the Old Town of Barcelona, a wonderful part of the city. It is composed of an open plan kitchen equipped with appliances and utensils, opening on to a large, cosy living room, a bathroom with shower and a comfortable double bedroom. The entire property is decorated with warm, bright colours that contribute to a feeling of homeliness. There is air conditioning, TV, internet connection and washing machine. El Raval, former Barri Xino has been reborn, becoming one of the most dynamic areas with the best cultural and artistic selection on offer in Barcelona. A labyrinth of hidden streets and beautiful squares with hundreds of restaurants, ethnic supermarkets open at all hours, attracting a multitude of young people who walk along Las Ramblas or enjoy clothes shopping in one of the many boutique fashion stores. To add to the appeal the building is in close proximity to the spectacular Museum of Contemporary Art of Barcelona (MACBA) and the Boqueria Market one of the best markets in the city. There are many different forms of transport including train lines, buses and metro stops that pass through the Raval or near it.   ShBarcelona enables you to book your furnished flat online, remotely, please contact us if you need more information.     ' The following information is provided for informational purposes only and is only applicable to primary residence contracts, not to seasonal rental contracts. Price of the last rent: 1190.00€/month. Owner is a large holder. Update of the income tax according to IRAV. '.

elementList.address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes
elementList.description: Enjoy the comfort and tranquility of this unique and central accommodation, in the heart of Barcelona. This bright and spacious apartment is designed to offer you a comfortable and pleasant experience. It has a large living-dining room with large windows that allow natural light to flood the space, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. From the living room, you can enjoy impressive views of the Gran Vía of Barcelona, and if you feel like getting some fresh air, you can do so from the two balconies that make the experience even more special. The location couldn't be better: it is located just a 5-minute walk from the Urgell metro stop and the main bus and commuter train lines, which will allow you to move around the city and its surroundings quickly and comfortably. In addition, you will be one step away from the best shops, restaurants and tourist attractions that the city has to offer. The apartment has a total of 3 bedrooms. The main room is a spacious and cozy double room, ideal for relaxing after a day exploring the city. The second room is very bright and has two single beds, perfect for receiving more people or for enjoying additional space. The third room has a single bed, ideal for guests or as a personal space. With 2 complete bathrooms with a modern and functional design, you will have all the comfort you need. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-quality appliances, ideal for those who enjoy cooking at home. It also has a beautiful terrace, perfect for relaxing outdoors, sunbathing or enjoying an al fresco meal. This apartment is available now for temporary rent, with stays ranging from 1 month to 11 months. It is ideal for those looking for a comfortable and well-located home for their stay in Barcelona, whether for work, studies or any other reason. Don't miss this opportunity to live in an apartment full of light, comfort and with an unbeatable location in Barcelona!

elementList.description: Temporary rental: available from January 2026 Beautiful property for rent with a large balcony and views of Paseo Joan de Borbó, in front of the brand new Marina Port Vell. The fully equipped apartment has two bedrooms, a large full bathroom, a large living-dining room, and a 3-meter linear terrace. It is a very bright apartment. Both bedrooms have access to a balcony, both the double and the single, and both are equipped. The house has two exits to the outside, a long and wide terrace that overlooks Joan de Borbó, which can perfectly fit an outdoor table and two chairs. The other balcony overlooks Calle del Mar. Very well air-conditioned apartment. The property is very complete, as can be seen in the photographs, there are many details in the furniture, small tables, lamps, cushions, etc. Parquet flooring in perfect condition. - Provision of supplies are paid separately - Temporary rental To coordinate your visit and for more information, contact us via email or WhatsApp.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in calle del Mar

elementList.description: This spacious and modern apartment consists of two bedrooms, one bathroom, a kitchen and a living room. The large kitchen will be to your right when you enter the apartment from the main door and it is fully equipped with everything you will need from lots of counter top space to a coffee maker. On the opposite side of the property, is the cozy and inviting living room with a lovely balcony as the main window. You can enjoy a relaxing night watching your favorite film or series on the comfortable sofa or enjoy your wonderful view of a tiny square in the city center. The bedrooms have all the basic necessities from comfy double beds to a little bit of storage space but you are welcome to decorate them as you want to help you feel at home during your stay in Barcelona. This property on Carrer de Sant Domènec del Call is in the heart of the Barcelona city center and it's located just a 1-minute walk from the most beautiful square in the city, Plaça de Sant Felip Neri. It is close to several major metro stations which can connect you to places all over the city but you will have numerous shops, cafés, bars, restaurants, boutiques, pharmacies, banks and more just steps from your front door so you won't need to go far to do your errands. On one end of your new street, you will find Museu Moto de Barcelona and Museo del Zapato and on the other side, Sinagoga Major de Barcelona, as well as many bars and cafés.

elementList.description: A spacious 57 m², 2-bedroom apartment is available to rent in El Raval, Barcelona. The apartment opens up to a large living space with plenty of sources of entertainment and seating space, great for hosting guests. There is access to a private balcony through bedroom 1, which comes complete with a window that when shut blocks out all the noise from the busy street.  The property is located on Carrer du Sant Pau in El Raval, Barcelona. Las Ramblas is a 3-minute walk away, which is home to come of Spain's most beautiful markets, so why buy your groceries at the supermarket when you can get them fresh and locally produced? The property is 3 minutes away from the Liceu metro station, connected to L3, so you've got great connections with the rest of the city. Many of Barcelona's greatest sights are within walking distance of the property as well as many great restaurants and bars, you'll never be bored living here.

The property is furnished and features central air conditioning, natural gas heating, and utilities such as electricity, water, gas, and WiFi, all included within a global limit. Restrictions apply: the space is suitable only for professionals (workers), and couples or families are welcome. Smoking and pets are not allowed. Spotahome has personally checked this property to guarantee its quality and standards. The location is in the vibrant El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot neighborhood, which offers excellent amenities and connectivity. Within walking distance, you can find a variety of restaurants, such as Forn Giralt, Granja-Bar Creta, and Vivari Coffee & Bakery. Nearby tourist attractions include Grupo Mediática and B-Mural. The area provides a lively and engaging environment for tenants looking for convenient proximity to services and entertainment.

elementList.description: **The real center** _Because you've got the Ramblas on both sides_ **Will I like it here? ** Yes. You're in a perfect central location but also have a cozy property with modern amenities. **Really? Tell me more... ** You will enjoy opening up your balcony doors and taking in the atmosphere. You also have a very well-equipped kitchen perfect for preparing delicious meals. We think the apartment is perfect for both couples and families who want a central location within easy access of everything the city has to offer.  **Your top 3 reasons to live here: ** - Bedroom 2 has a private balcony. - Your kitchen has all integrated appliances. - You can bring your pets with you! **But you need to know this... ** - Bedroom 1 is a bit smaller. **And this... ** - No smoking, sorry! **Our Homechecker, Irene, said: ** _“Everything is about a 10-15 minute walk away. ”_ **Give it to me straight... ** This is a beautiful 3rd-floor, 2-bedroom apartment on Passatge de Bernardí Martorell in Barcelona. It's comfortable and welcoming and has the bonus of a washing machine too.  We think a young couple looking to start a family could enjoy living here, as could postgraduate students looking to live somewhere central. If you want to bring your pet, this property is also a win.

The apartment has been carefully decorated and equipped, designed to offer maximum comfort during temporary stays, combining functionality, design, and warmth. It has a bedroom with heating and a high-quality bed, ideal for ensuring optimal rest. The fully equipped kitchen has a washing machine, dryer, coffee maker, toaster, electric kettle, and complete kitchenware. The living-dining room, cozy and bright, has a sofa bed, television, and access to an outdoor balcony, providing natural light and a pleasant feeling of spaciousness. A home that offers a comfortable and well-cared-for experience, ideal for those looking for a temporary stay in Barcelona without sacrificing tranquility or comfort. Contact us and be the first to visit it! You will feel at home!

The apartment has a great location just a few minutes walk from the Arc de Triomphe and the Parc de la Ciutadella, and not more than 10 minutes away from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. There are various subway lines right next to the accommodation, which makes it a perfect place for visiting the city and enjoying your stay to the maximum. The studio apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, and a double bed. It is an ideal place if you plan to come with your partner or friend. Enjoy the nightlife of the city, walk the narrow streets of the Born and breathe in the atmosphere of medieval architecture, visit the Olympic vila, or just take advantage of the cultural offerings of the area. Important Pets are allowed with an additional fee of 150 euros per month. Important Pets are allowed with an additional fee of 150 euros per month. GENERAL CONDITIONS: - The rent will be collected on the same day of the month as the check-in date.  * If during the last month you stay less than 10 days after that date: you'll pay per extra day  * If during the last month you stay more than 15 days after that date: you'll pay one extra month 8.-Arrivals policy: Monday to Friday: 15h - 18:30: Free of charge 18:30 - 21:00: 30€ 21:00 - 23:00: 50€ 23h or after: under request Weekends and public holidays: 15h - 21:00: 30€ 21:00 - 23:00: 50€ 23h or after: under request ** From 10:00 p.m. at 8:00 am. you must be quiet. Parties not allowed. Smoking not allowed. If the police come to the apartment or the neighbors call the Government/Police, you will be evicted from the apartment and/or have to pay a fine. - The apartment does not have any food (there is no coffee, salt, oil, sugar). - We provide guests with a kit of welcome amenities (1-2 toilet rolls, neutral soap in small quantities - they are not for the entire stay). There are always towels and sheets.

Accepted age: From 18 years old ************* HOW DOES SPACEST.COM WORK? Spacest.com is an online platform for medium-long term rentals that was created as a guarantee for the tenant: we check all the apartments and the photos are recent and reliable so you can book online with peace of mind to prevent someone from doing it before you. To book online, follow the link at the bottom of the page (below the map) and click "rent now". If you need help, please contact us and we will help you. Deposit: 3600 Cancellation notice: None months TEMPORARY RENTAL GREAT OPPORTUNITY! Unique apartment in an excellent area Made up of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a very bright living room with an open and spacious kitchen. Southwest-oriented has a lot of brightness during the afternoon in the summer or winter. The apartment is very quiet and has a lot of privacy, it does not share any walls with neighbors. Distributed in a separated day and night design, perfect distribution for families. In a semi-royal property with few neighbors, located on the real second floor without a lift with few stairs. Principals characters: Very high roofs with old elements like wooden doors and windows of high quality, brick walls combining modern elements with a high quality finish. • Cool/heat air conditioning system. • Combination of parquet floor of high strength and hydraulic floor in humid areas. • Restoration of old elements • High-quality kitchen totally equipped with two areas • High-quality windows that promise a perfect sound insulation • Fitted wardrobe The flat is completely furnished and ready to move in! Prime location, located between the districts of ́ ́Glories ́ ́ and the residential area of ́ ́Poble Nou ́ ́. The flat is located in an ever more competitive environment because of urban and cultural development and where the offer of good quality housing is extremely limited or very expensive. The apartment is located specifically at the entrance of the future park of “Les Glories” which is under construction, this park will be the largest and most important park in Barcelona and at the same time, there is a lot of roads that facilitate to move to the center of the city or outside the city. RENTAL CONDITION: -Monthly rent: 1800€/month. -Utilities: 300€/month -Internet: to be hired by the tenant. -Agency fees: A single payment equivalent to one month's rent + 21% VAT. -Cleaning expenses: a single payment of 240€ (VAT included). -Contract preparation: a single payment of 240€ (VAT included). DEPOSIT: -RENTALS FROM 1 TO 5 MONTHS: YOU HAVE TO PAY THE EQUIVALENT OF ONE AND A HALF MONTHS' RENT. -RENTALS FROM 6 TO 11 MONTHS: YOU HAVE TO PAY THE EQUIVALENT OF TWO MONTHS' RENT. After the reservation is confirmed, you will receive a separate email with the next steps to complete the booking process and organize the check in with the agency. Check ins are possible during the week from Monday to Friday from 09:30am until 17:30pm or after office hours for an extra fee of 85€ + 21% VAT.

elementList.description: SEASONAL CONTRACTS ONLY. Available Now. This apartment is located on the left side of Eixample, on the 3rd floor of a rehabilitated "finca règia" building with elevator. The apartment bathroom is recently renovated and has been all furnished. There is a fully furnished independent kitchen with dining àrea, two double bedrooms both with double beds (one large exterior and one slightly smaller interior), and a third room used as an office/wardrobe, and one full bathroom. The living room and exterior bedroom both have a balcony to the interior courtyard, and there are high ceilings and original hydraulic floors. The apartment is great for a couple or to share between two friends, looking for a charming home in the safe, residential neighbourhood of Eixample. Please contact only by email.

elementList.description: For information about this property, please do not call. Request more information or a visit from the ad itself. It is very important to "define your profile" when requesting a visit to the property, as those who do will have priority in the order of visits to be made. Gran de la Sagrera next to Garcilaso. Ground floor apartment with street access. Brand new, completely renovated. It consists of a spacious living room with integrated kitchen and access to a terrace of approximately 25 square meters, a windowless room for an office or dressing room, with access from the living room, a very spacious double bedroom suite with access to the terrace and a large bathroom with shower. On the terrace there is a closed space, with a sliding door, for a machine room and storage space. Apartment with very high ceilings and large windows. Split air conditioning in the living room and bedroom suite. The surfaces are approximate. Information of interest: Applicable rent, according to the informative certificate of price reference €1,027. 75 + 10% applicable for comprehensive renovation €102 = €1,129. 75 rent + €31.82 property tax + €30 community fees, total €1,192. 35.

elementList.description: Tecnocasa rents a magnificent apartment in Plaza Europa! High and exterior housing, with excellent views and great luminosity, located in a modern and cosmopolitan environment. It stands out for its optimal communication, with easy access to the metro (L8, L9S), train (R2, R2N, R50, R6, R60, S3, S4, S8) and various bus lines (H12, L86, L94, L95). The house has a ducted air conditioning system, guaranteeing comfort throughout the year. In addition, it offers exclusive common areas, including a heated community pool and a fully equipped gym, ideal for enjoying a comfortable and healthy lifestyle without leaving home. Distribution of the property: - Spacious and bright living-dining room - 3 bedrooms - 2 bathrooms: one with a bathtub and the other with a shower - Independent kitchen of generous dimensions - Balcony with clear and spectacular views - Parking space and storage room included in the price Common areas and property: Heated community pool Gym 3 elevators Solar panels A modern, comfortable and perfectly located home. Don't miss the opportunity to visit it! For more information, you can go to our point of sale in Plaza Europa nº 14, Local B. We are waiting for you!
